messages.subject: special cases
messages.msgSnippet: Bridget, I appreciate hearing about your son because I feel like my son is a special case also.  He s always been a huge challenge for me.  He s in first grade
messages.messageBody:
Bridget,

I appreciate hearing about your son because I feel like my son is a special
case also. He's always been a huge challenge for me. He's in first grade
right now after unschooling before that & after this year he'll be home
again. I was trying to give him something all his own hoping I'd see
improvement in his behavior. Behavior is no better from it but it's opened
so many doors in his mind that I only hope I can find ways to fill. There's
more I want to say but since I'm overwhelmed & hormonal I'll skip the verbal
diarrhea. My point is that suggestions & support for unschooling my
challenging boy is exactly what I am looking for on these lists, along with
juggling 3 kids when I'm chained to a breast pump.

Blessings,
Sara
